item.title: Beyond Code: Open Source, Mentorship and Microcks
item.description: Open source software proves that collective contribution creates collective value. However, as a contributor to Microcks, I have observed a concerning pattern that threatens the sustainability of the project and countless others in the open source ecosystem.
